body: @Prf.NTR I don't think you understand, calling the police is a better way here, because the guy is literally being "attacked", he has the right to defend himself, calling the police doesnt have anything to do with relationship

@MOTIVATED.BC.ITS.SAD, plot twist: All the police in Ntr doujins has an orgy seggs with their comrades in their office, that's why they don't have time to give a fvked about the characters being rape or cheated (fictional side). And also in reality relationship problems is not a thing for the police they should go to relationship counseling or smthn like that, unless those couple starts to kill each other, that would be a matter for the police(Reality side). I hope this make sense
Why is Police nonexistent in this manga like every NTR manga. Come on man Imagine I could just barge in your door you could literary call the police at a situation like that (sigh).
